3117.text:
"I'm sorry"
I didn't need her to apologize

3121.text:
She needed for her own heart
And she has never ever been in the way

3126.text:
And it was nine months of birth pains
For my wife to come on page

3132.text:
This thing brings persecution
This thing brings misunderstanding

3137.text:
This thing stirs up religion, in a really
bad way

3142.text:
Don't you grow weary in doing good
Because in due season you will reap

3148.text:
You will reap
Christianity is supernatural

3153.text:
Christianity is completely heaven sent
And you are supposed to be filled with the

3160.text:
same Holy Spirit that raised Jesus from the
dead

3163.text:
My question is this:
What are you waiting for guys?
